body: Dear Chris and Mostapha Can you kindly tell me whats wrong with is simulation,  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3NiB4LFE7cVYJNxUR2ATcx4CTelbEroYLkWuT0SrhR6UiOGrMA0eldRh6NNmVLRvNahV17WnzyOC86Ym1609gpnrXRu2k94T/Canvasat111628.png) and the results so crazzy errors.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3NiB4LFE7cUlzaYDrqaHpcAzdl46eYC4YD7ES5ODHGy7q-dtQ9fi5yr8ahWMlLUMvxD1MfR*XbR6S3DG0rXh7tTTd8DhqPrd/Canvasat111805.png) Hey Bros i know how much good you are at this, but really my mind JAMMM now, kind regards
